headline: Will Caterpillar’s AI-Enabled Fleet and Factory Upgrades Change Caterpillar's (CAT) Narrative
summary: Caterpillar Inc. recently unveiled a suite of Industrial AI advances, including the Cat AI Assistant and expanded NVIDIA collaboration, aimed at bringing AI-enabled autonomy and intelligent in-cab experiences to construction, mining and power equipment, while also using digital twins and AI to reshape its manufacturing and supply chain operations. These moves suggest Caterpillar is working to turn its installed base of heavy machinery into a connected, AI-ready platform that could embed the...

headline: Should You Buy Dividend Aristocrats in 2026?
summary: Dividend-paying stocks provide many clear benefits. But should you bother with them in the fresh year?
